a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Primary energy consumption by source, World
Energy consumption is shown as direct primary energy in terawatt-hours (TWh). This means this does not correct
for fossil fuel inefficiencies in conversion to useful energy estimates.
Source: BP Statistical Review of Global Energy (2020)
Note: 'Other renewables' includes geothermal, biomass and waste energy.
